result.markdown: --- title: "Welcome to my blog" subtitle: "A blog about data science and other related topics" author: "Jaime Arboleda" date: 19/09/2022 categories: - blog toc: true img: "welcome.png" --- ## A data science blog Hi! This is my blog about data science, statistics, machine learning and other related (mostly) topics. I decided to start this blog thanks to the wonderful tool developed by RStudio called Quarto, that makes it easier than ever to pack a bunch of scripts into a blog. I won't post very often, and many of my posts will have an educative content that I will create for myself (for my future self), but that I think could be of interest of other people, so I think that making them public is helpful. If you find here something interesting, don't hesitate to say it and leave a comment. :smile:
